title: Clifford Algebraic Remark on the Mandelbrot Set of Two--Component Number Systems
abstract: We investigate with the help of Clifford algebraic methods the Mandelbrot set over arbitrary two-component number systems. The complex numbers are regarded as operator spinors in D\times spin(2) resp. spin(2). The thereby induced (pseudo) normforms and traces are not the usual ones. A multi quadratic set is obtained in the hyperbolic case contrary to [1]. In the hyperbolic case a breakdown of this simple dynamics takes place.
